sentences.sContent: Anna tried to look interested. Actually, she was bored stiff.
sentences.sCn: 安娜试图装出感兴趣的样子。实际上她都厌烦透了。

synos.tran: 呆板的；坚硬的；严厉的；拘谨的；拘谨的
死尸；令人讨厌者；[金融]流通票据；劳动者

phrases.pCn: 脖子发僵，斜颈；顽固之人

remMethod.val: 长时间不动(still)就变得僵硬(stiff)

trans.tranCn: 极其， 非常； 僵硬地
trans.tranOther: If you are bored stiff, worried stiff, or scared stiff, you are extremely bored, worried, or scared

trans.tranCn: 硬的，僵直的；呆板的；拘谨的；艰难的，费劲的；强烈的
trans.tranOther: if someone or a part of their body is stiff, their muscles hurt and it is difficult for them to move
